features: 100% CERTIFIED ORGANIC COTTON CORE: ROSE applicator tampons are comfortable, highly absorbent, and hypoallergenic to reduce irritation and allergy symptoms. Made with only certified organic cotton
REGULAR ABSORBENCY TAMPONS: ROSE organic tampons offer you a regular or super absorbency level to choose from.
BPA FREE CARDBOARD APPLICATOR: We care about your body - 100% biodegradable, viscose/rayon free, no chlorine or dioxin used, no perfume, simply pure and natural ingredients. Period

MADE FOR MODERN WOMEN: Cardboard applicator with a rounded smooth tip for comfortable and soft insertion. Perfectly fits your body with total comfort and with leak protection technology to give you full protection and a stress-free day, now you can fully enjoy your day

PERFECT FIT, SAFE USE: Each tampon is paper wrapped individually for hygienic purposes. Easy carrying and access. Contains a unique security veil covering the absorbent core to prevent fiber shedding during removal.
body.description: ROSE Tampons made from 100% organic cotton. Unscented and chlorine and toxin free! ROSE tampons are comfortable, highly absorbent and hypoallergenic to reduce irritation and allergy symptoms. Made with only organic cotton, veil and cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a tampon that is 100% organic cotton and toxin free that actually works. So many times the tampon does not absorb well. Appreciate that they use a smooth biodegradable cardboard applicator instead of plastic one that winds up on the beach shores. All together I am really happy with the product and would order it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great quality + no plastic parts, hallelujah.
